nodes.text: Galdovar was a Human male Galactic Republic Intelligence agent who was in contact with Hallena Devis on JanFathal in the city of Athar during the Clone Wars. In 22 BBY, he contacted Devis about Merish Hath and Shil Kaval who were serving as allies to the Confederacy of Independent Systems. He was able to give her a code name, known as Orla Taman.
